channel.title: VPS // Need A Little Help Before Buyying One
channel.description:
Hello, Iv'e Been Around The Whole Coding Process For Quite Some Time.
Ive Been Of And On Runescape, But Ive Decided To Make A RSPS, But I Need A Little Help, I Know Out Hosting And Stuff As Ive Brought Hosting For GTA:SA, But Im Thinking This Is A Little Different, With The VPS, My Questions Are. Bassically..
1.) Is It Easy To Set It All Up (By This I Mean Work Stuff Out, Put Server Files On Ect // Remote Desktop It) ...
I Know The Knowledge In The Windows XP, So I Might Go For Windows XP
But Is It All Easy Enough.
As Im Not Dumb, Just Around The Whole Hosting Its A New Experience!
Thankyou For Your Help && Advance Posts.
~Kyle

item.title: VPS // Need A Little Help Before Buyying One

item.description:
@ltownerlt wrote:

plus it’s just as easy to manage everything if you have someone who knows a little linux

item.title: VPS // Need A Little Help Before Buyying One
item.dc:creator: @iKapa iKapa
item.description:
@iKapa wrote:

Yeah go for Linux. Hell of a lot cheaper and a LOT more stable than a Windows server.

item.source: VPS // Need A Little Help Before Buyying One

item.title: VPS // Need A Little Help Before Buyying One
item.dc:creator: @ltownerlt ltownerlt
item.description:
@ltownerlt wrote:

if i were you i would get a linux VPS not a windows one because linux is cheaper and more stable ant for the set up its very easy you just download java create a .sh file upload ur server and ur ready to go for the remote desktom i’m using filezilla i just connect through it using port 22 and i do all my file uploading there plus i use putty with SSH connection to manage everything exept file uploading

Read full topic
item.source: VPS // Need A Little Help Before Buyying One
